content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Copper Cable Factory at position (1.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
• Assembling Machine (produces copper cable) at (1.5, 19.5)
• Cable factory input Chest at (2.5, 17.5)
• Burner Inserter (with coal fuel) at (1.5, 17.5)
• Burner Inserter at (2.5, 16.5)
• Burner Inserter at (3.5, 17.5)

### Depot Belt System at position (3.5, 15.5)
Consists of the following entities:
• Wooden Chest (serving as belt depot) at (3.5, 15.5)
• Dedicated Transport Belt segment at (4.5, 15.5)
• Depot Burner Inserter at (3.5, 14.5)

### Extraction System at position (–3.5, 27.5)
Consists of the following entity:
• Extraction System Burner Inserter at (–3.5, 27.5) with drop position (–3.5, 28.5)

### Electricity Generator at position (–0.5, 24.5)
Consists of the following entities:
• Steam Engine (Generator) at (–0.5, 24.5)
• Boiler at (–5.5, 24.0)
• Offshore Pump at (–7.5, 25.5)

### Research Lab (position not provided)
Consists of the following entity:
• Lab with lab input {'automation‑science‑pack': 17} and electrical_id 7106

### Smelting Unit A at position (–3.0, 19.0)
Consists of the following entities:
• Stone Furnace (producing iron‑plate) at (–3.0, 19.0)
• Wooden Chest at (–4.5, 18.5)

### Smelting Unit B at position (–4.0, 21.0)
Consists of the following entities:
• Stone Furnace (producing copper‑plate) at (–4.0, 21.0)
• Wooden Chest at (–5.5, 21.5)

### Provisioning Depot at position (1.5, 21.5)
Consists of the following entities:
• Wooden Chest at (1.5, 21.5)
• Burner Inserter at (0.5, 21.5)

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Belt Connection Error (observed in Steps 210, 211, 213, 214, 215, 216, and 217)
  – When connecting transport belts, verify that the target is not a steam engine. Always add an inserter that feeds items into the steam engine and use that inserter as the connection target.

• Entity Placement Distance Error
  – Ensure that the player is within the maximum placement range when attempting to place an entity (for example, moving closer before placing a wooden chest).

• Inventory Shortage Error
  – Confirm that the required entity is present in the inventory prior to attempting its placement.

• Name Reference Error
  – Check that all variable names (e.g. ‘target_chest’) are correctly defined and referenced consistently to avoid runtime name errors.
